author: Hannah Bleau, Hannah Bleau
title: McDonald's Employees Stage Walkout After Worker Tests Positive for Coronavirus
description: Employees of a Los Angeles McDonald's walked out in protest on Sunday after learning that one of their coworkers tested positive for the coronavirus. They are now demanding more support from their superiors and the addition of safety equipment, including mask…
content: Employees of a Los Angeles McDonald’s walked out in protest on Sunday after learning that one of their coworkers tested positive for the coronavirus. They are now demanding more support from their superiors and the addition of safety equipment, including mask… [+2698 chars]
